name: Space Invaders 3D Remake
description:
Welcome to our game : Space Invaders Remake!

You loved Space Invaders back when you were a child but you wish you could play a new game changing version? Seek no more!

Hi! 
We are Game Art and Game Programming freshmen from a Video Game College in Montpellier, France.
This game is a project that is part of our mandatory Game Production course. Actually, it is the third project we've ever done! 
It has been made on Unity and the project lasted a bit more than 2 months.

Discover a new Space Invaders' world in 3D! Shoot aliens to save the city!

Have fun!

Controls The Team
